name: rocketmq-operator-0.3.0
body:
Below is a summary of the 0.3.0 release of rocketmq-operator. In this version, accessing Apache RocketMQ from outside the Kubernetes cluster is available, the addresses of Name Servers can be set automatically, memory limit in container is sensible so that calculation of JVM parameters is more accurate. The version of operator-sdk has been updated to 1.16. Also, the docker repository for rocketmq-operator has been moved to an official repository under [Apache](https://hub.docker.com/r/apache/rocketmq-operator).

## What's Changed
* [ISSUE #36] Change default memory resource limit config to avoid broker pod OOMKilled error by @liuruiyiyang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/41
* [ISSUE #29] Store the broker configuration and jvm parameters in configmap by @zhihui921016 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/25
* [ISSUE #45] Fix store path and auto-set nameserver IP list by @liuruiyiyang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/46
* [ISSUE #48]doc: fix README typo by @Yiyiyimu in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/47
* [ISSUE #39] Add RocketMQ Console CRD and Controller by @liuruiyiyang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/53
* Security Contexts for Broker and Nameserver by @AdheipSingh in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/67
* [ISSUE 76] Fix empty nameservice address in broker by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/94
* [ISSUE 80] Skipping generating data replication command when remote command returns error by @caigy in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/82
* [Issue 84]fix cpu and mem in docker for Linux by @overstep123 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/81
* Fea: add imagePullSecret for Broker/Nameservice/Console by @StevenLeiZhang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/90
* [ISSUE 96] Upgrade operator-sdk tool to version 1.16 by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/97
* [ISSUE #100]Add printcolomns to operator resources by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/101
* [ISSUE #107] Fix role permissions by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/108
* [ISSUE #114] generate metadata sub structure by @ltamber in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/116
* feat(broker): Support HostNetwork for broker by @shangjin92 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/105
* [ISSUE #119] Add event resource permission by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/118
* [ISSUE #120] fix(nameservice): add sorting for hostIps and instance.Status.NameServers before deepEqual by @shangjin92 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/104
* [ISSUE #121] feat(core): Support ServiceAccountName for broker/nameserver/console in OpenShift by @shangjin92 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/106
* [ISSUE #123] Fix the nameServerListStr empty bug by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/124
* [ISSUE #125] update README by @caigy in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/126
* [ISSUE #128] v0.3.0 release by @caigy in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/129

## New Contributors
* @Yiyiyimu made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/47
* @AdheipSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/67
* @gobbq made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/94
* @caigy made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/82
* @overstep123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/81
* @StevenLeiZhang made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/90
* @ltamber made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/116
* @shangjin92 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/105

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/compare/0.2.1...0.3.0

name: 0.3.0-rc1
body:
This is a prerelease version for rocketmq-operator v0.3.0. In this version, accessing Apache RocketMQ from outside the Kubernetes cluster is available, the addresses of Name Servers can be set automatically, memory limit in container is sensible so that calculation of JVM parameters is more accurate. The version of `operator-sdk` has been updated to 1.16. Also, the docker repository for  rocketmq-operator has been moved to an official repository under [Apache](https://hub.docker.com/r/apache/rocketmq-operator).

## What's Changed
* [ISSUE #36] Change default memory resource limit config to avoid broker pod OOMKilled error by @liuruiyiyang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/41
* [ISSUE #29] Store the broker configuration and jvm parameters in configmap by @zhihui921016 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/25
* [ISSUE #45] Fix store path and auto-set nameserver IP list by @liuruiyiyang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/46
* [ISSUE #48]doc: fix README typo by @Yiyiyimu in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/47
* [ISSUE #39] Add RocketMQ Console CRD and Controller by @liuruiyiyang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/53
* Security Contexts for Broker and Nameserver by @AdheipSingh in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/67
* [ISSUE 76] Fix empty nameservice address in broker by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/94
* [ISSUE 80] Skipping generating data replication command when remote command returns error by @caigy in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/82
* [Issue 84]fix cpu and mem in docker for Linux by @overstep123 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/81
* Fea: add imagePullSecret for Broker/Nameservice/Console by @StevenLeiZhang in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/90
* [ISSUE 96] Upgrade operator-sdk tool to version 1.16 by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/97
* [ISSUE #100]Add printcolomns to operator resources by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/101
* [ISSUE #107] Fix role permissions by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/108
* [ISSUE #114] generate metadata sub structure by @ltamber in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/116
* feat(broker): Support HostNetwork for broker by @shangjin92 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/105
* [ISSUE #119] Add event resource permission by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/118
* [ISSUE #120] fix(nameservice): add sorting for hostIps and instance.Status.NameServers before deepEqual by @shangjin92 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/104
* [ISSUE #121] feat(core): Support ServiceAccountName for broker/nameserver/console in OpenShift by @shangjin92 in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/106
* [ISSUE #123] Fix the nameServerListStr empty bug by @gobbq in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/124
* [ISSUE #125] update README by @caigy in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/126

## New Contributors
* @Yiyiyimu made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/47
* @AdheipSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/67
* @gobbq made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/94
* @caigy made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/82
* @overstep123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/81
* @StevenLeiZhang made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/90
* @ltamber made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/116
* @shangjin92 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/pull/105

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-operator/compare/0.2.1...0.3.0-rc1

name: rocketmq-operator-0.2.1
body:
New Features:
1. Open resource limitation in CRD.
2. Open HostNetwork and DNSPolicy in CRD.
3. Automatically use all name server IP list for broker config when set ```nameServers: ""```

name: rocketmq-operator-0.2.0
body: Step over installation and upgrades operation in kubernetes.
